stripped_text: Neurostasis can be advanced. If you pay 3 credits when the Runner accesses Neurostasis, choose 1 installed Runner card for each advancement token on Neurostasis. The Runner must shuffle the chosen cards into the stack.
text:
Neurostasis can be advanced.
If you pay 3[credit] when the Runner accesses Neurostasis, choose 1 installed Runner card for each advancement token on Neurostasis. The Runner must shuffle the chosen cards into the stack.
title: Neurostasis
